summary: Completed second iteration testing of Real Estate Decision Assistant. Session persistence issues from iteration 1 have been partially resolved - authentication now works correctly. However, discovered critical UI interaction bugs with modal dropdowns that block project creation workflow. Supabase integration and core data loading functionality work perfectly.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts pointer events preventing dropdown option selection
ui_bugs.selector: DialogOverlay blocks clicks on SelectItem components
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot complete project creation - blocks main workflow

ui_bugs.issue: Missing INVEST project type - only BUY and RENT available
ui_bugs.impact: Requirements specified BUY/RENT/INVEST but INVEST option missing

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete project creation due to dropdown interaction failures

passed_tests: Supabase connection and database queries (17 system criteria, 93 enum values)
User authentication flows (signup and login working correctly)
Session management improvements (no immediate logout after login)
New Project dialog opening and form field rendering
Form validation and UI component rendering
Sign out button visibility and placement
Back navigation button presence on project detail pages
Data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix modal overlay z-index issues preventing dropdown interactions in project creation dialog. The DialogOverlay component is intercepting pointer events and blocking SelectItem clicks. Also add missing INVEST project type option to match requirements. Session persistence appears improved but needs verification after UI fixes.
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (Supabase working perfectly), Frontend: 60% (auth and navigation work, but project creation blocked by UI bugs)
